segments.text: I notice the angled view of the kitchen, with the sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's facing left, concentrating on drying the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet is on, causing the basin to overflow steadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming on the floor, reaching her shoe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her right, stacks of clean dishes on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window above shows a tidy garden path and bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the left, open cabinet with the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on a two-step stool, reaching in with one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate in the other, stool tilting back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl nearby, arm raised toward the jar expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Lower cabinets have water running down their doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains tied back on the window panes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between inside hazards and outside calm is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No one seems aware of the potential accidents brewing.
segments.speaker: PAR
